channel.title: How to make aura's not give recharge times for admin's+
channel.description: is there anyway to make aura's not give recharge time for admin's+ like supreme corruption gives 3 hours and 57 minutes is there a command to make it finish charge? or a method were admin and owners dont have to wait for charges? whats the code? and what file to put it in? we dont usually need help lol as you can see this is my first post cause i never needed an account...but guess i do :D thanks alot -Adrenaline_Ltd you can either add me on skype at adrenaline-ltd, comment below, or PM me! :) thanks again!
